title: CARNIFEX Announces Hell Chose Me Anniversary Tour With DEVOURMENT, DISTANT & More
description: Bodybox and Monochromatic Black will be there too. The post CARNIFEX Announces Hell Chose Me Anniversary Tour With DEVOURMENT, DISTANT & More appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Bodybox and Monochromatic Black will be there too.
text: Carnifex is celebrating 15 years of Hell Chose Me with a pretty extensive US tour this June and July. The tour features Devourment (for the first half of the trek), Distant, Bodybox, and Monochromatic Black. The tour kicks off on June 20 at The Belasco in Los Angeles, CA and wraps up on July 26 at the Riverside Municipal Auditorium in Riverside, CA. Tickets are available here. html:
Carnifex is celebrating 15 years of Hell Chose Me with a pretty extensive US tour this June and July. The tour features Devourment (for the first half of the trek), Distant, Bodybox, and Monochromatic Black. The tour kicks off on June 20 at The Belasco in Los Angeles, CA and wraps up on July 26 at the Riverside Municipal Auditorium in Riverside, CA. Tickets are available here.
